heading: IMRATHI BLOG
description: Developed a bespoke blog application from the ground up, integrating user authentication and authorization using JWT tokens. Added role-based, allowing users to create, edit, and delete posts based on their assigned roles. Incorporated a rich text editor to facilitate formatting of blog content. Enabled features such as liking, commenting, and editing posts, fostering user engagement and interaction.

heading: IMAGE HOSTING
description: A simple backend server in golang to upload compressed image in gridfs bucked in mongodb and then serve them using image id from a rest endpoint with in memory caching on server to reduce database calls to fetch image chunks data from gridfs bucket. There are two REST APIs to upload image and to serve image.

heading: ASSURANCE
description: Transformed the complete website from a Nodejs Application to a React static Website to save deployment costs - Setup CI/CD on GitHub, DNS from GoDaddy, AWS SES service, Pub/Sub function, Minimize website services costs to around $5/month

heading: SHORTLY
description: A URL shortener service which takes a long URL and converts it into a short URL which can be used to redirect to the original URL. User can also add custom shorten code or can use the one generated by the service.

heading: INVOICE GEN
description: A simple web app to generate invoices for your clients. You can add clients, products and generate invoices for them. You can also email the generated invoice to all the concerned parties.

heading: CHATTY
description: A chat application where users can create rooms or join some public rooms and chat with each other. Users can create custom room and can share room code with others to join the room.

heading: DRISHTI
description: A Hardware project which is made to navigate blind people through non-intuitive muscle stimulation using Raspberry pi, Pi cam, Muscle Simulator, OpenCv for object detection and Proximity sensor which won SIH 2020 and IICDC conclave 2019 and funded by college incubation centre.
